address: Xã Định Hòa, Huyện Gò Quao, Tỉnh Kiên Giang
thought:
**Analyzing and Mapping Vietnamese Administrative Units**

Okay, so I'm presented with the old address "Xã Định Hòa, Huyện Gò Quao, Tỉnh Kiên Giang" and my task is to find the corresponding new address. As an expert in this field, I know the process. First, I break down the components: Ward (Xã Định Hòa), District (Huyện Gò Quao), and Province (Tỉnh Kiên Giang).

Knowing that province name changes are a prime source of address updates, my initial focus is on "Tỉnh Kiên Giang." I recall that the merging of provinces has happened in recent years and I consult the relevant resolutions. Sure enough, resolution 60-NQ/TW states that Kiên Giang merged with An Giang, becoming "Tỉnh An Giang." This is my first key finding.

Now, my attention shifts to the fate of "Xã Định Hòa." I dive into the available resolutions, specifically looking for those related to "Tỉnh An Giang" – my new province. I need to uncover any changes to the administrative units, in this case the ward, that were previously under the former "Kiên Giang."

I scanned through the resolutions provided. Resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, concerning An Giang province, immediately catches my eye. It explicitly mentions "Định Hòa." Line 57 reads, "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Thới Quản, Thủy Liễu và **Định Hòa** thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Định Hòa**." This is a perfect match – the resolution deals with the area that I am looking for. Line 58 mentions merging the town of "Gò Quao" which means the resolution applies to the districts in which I am interested. This is a very strong lead.

I cross-check other resolutions just to be thorough, but they all relate to different provinces or districts: "Đồng Tháp", "Ninh Bình", "Thái Nguyên", "Hồ Chí Minh", and "Thanh Hóa." So, they can be disregarded. Resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15 for "Tỉnh An Giang" remains the most relevant. The presence of Gò Quao in this same document cements its relevance.

Therefore, my expert analysis concludes that the old "Xã Định Hòa, Huyện Gò Quao, Tỉnh Kiên Giang" has been absorbed into the same "Xã Định Hòa" under the new "Tỉnh An Giang". The resolution details the merger, and my understanding of these administrative changes confirms the match.

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 57. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Thới Quản, Thủy Liễu và Định Hòa thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Định Hòa**.
